title: What the HELL riot??? 20 min penalty for solo 9 bot custom game?????
body:
What the actuall **** is going on???? Did I seriously just get a damn 20 min penalty from a  BOT GAME, CUSTOM, NO PLAYERS, 3V5??????????? ARE YOU FKIN KIDDING ME??? riot, this is litteraly pissing me off so much. Custom games are supposed to be pass timers when you don't want to play a real game. What the ****. 20
minute
damn
penalty
fix this issue RIGHT NOW. this is just making me so mad. riot, fix your game.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems your Leaverbuster penalty was caused by a recent trend of going AFK/leaving games. If you're experiencing a technical issue that is causing this, I'll be happy to assist you in troubleshooting it, but I'm not able to remove your penalties in any capacity.

Let me know if you have any questions.
